page.title: 03SOUTH-WEST BRISTOL INDUSTRY
page.content: There are four main areas of{industry} in South-West Bristol.These are {trading estates}and they are located at Bishopworth,Novers Hill,Hartcliffe Way and Ashton Vale.There are also ,two large separate {factories.}W.D.and H.O.Wills is situated on Hartcliffe Way.The firm produces cigarettes and tobacco.John Harvey&Sons Limited bottle sherry at their Whitchurch Lane factory. The trading estates and factories are all situated on main roads providing good{accessibility}for goods vehicles. The trading estates vary in size.The Ashton Vale estate has 55 firms.There are a variety of firms on the estates,these include:building contractors,car repairs,electrical depots and wholesale warehouses.
